UniprotID	Q6P5Q4
Accession	Q6P5Q4;A4D0W9;A4D0Y2;Q8WVJ8
EntryName	LMOD2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Leiomodin-2 (Cardiac leiomodin) (C-LMOD) (Leiomodin)
GeneName	LMOD2
Length	547
Function	Mediates nucleation of actin filaments and thereby promotes actin polymerization (PubMed:18403713, PubMed:25250574, PubMed:26370058, PubMed:26417072). Plays a role in the regulation of actin filament length (By similarity). Required for normal sarcomere organization in the heart, and for normal heart function (PubMed:18403713).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Myofibril; Sarcomere; Cytoplasm; Myofibril; Cytoplasm; Myofibril; Sarcomere; M line; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton
